channel.title: I'm leaving
channel.description:
[quote="ruler"]I decided if you can't beat them join them.[/quote]
I will be leaving for 2 weeks on the 15th of October, 11 PM GMT. I am going to Egypt for my holiday. :D If you need to contact me, email me using niallcoates@tiscali.co.uk perferably, niallcoates@msn.com or pm me here.
[size=6pt]Sorry, couldn't resist. XD[/size]

item.title: I'm leaving
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

That’s the pool, this is the palace.

That’s the old one, atleast. We’ll be right next door, but there both the same really. 10 More hours to go.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm leaving
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:18, topic:18190”]Mr.Chris, I’ve been there before.

I’ll be staying in the new Winter Palace holtel. If you want a “shit hole”, visit Cairo. (No offence, Sepranem), On the way to the pyramids I remember walking down a street and just wanted to die.

My mum does pratically everything herself, no tour groups, always better this way. (I like Karnak temple in Luxor, just amazing.)[/quote]

The Winter Palace hotel was like a 5 minute walk from the boat were I went! Apparently, it is really luxorious, and regarded one of the best hotels in Egypt.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm leaving
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Sepranem, post:19, topic:18190”]None taken.

There’s definitely some places I hate in Cairo, like Shobra and places like that, but Maadi itself is nice. I haven’t been to Luxor or Aswan before, but you’re smart for going late in the year, or else you’d get fried. I’ve gotta say, Alexandria and Sharm El-Sheikh are pretty sweet too.[/quote]

We went to Aswan, Sharm El-Sheikh last time, this time we might do them again & Alexandria.

Last time we went in June, wasn’t that bad. None of us got sun burn.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm leaving
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

None taken.

There’s definitely some places I hate in Cairo, like Shobra and places like that, but Maadi itself is nice. I haven’t been to Luxor or Aswan before, but you’re smart for going late in the year, or else you’d get fried. I’ve gotta say, Alexandria and Sharm El-Sheikh are pretty sweet too.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm leaving
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Mr.Chris, I’ve been there before.

I’ll be staying in the new Winter Palace holtel. If you want a “shit hole”, visit Cairo. (No offence, Sepranem), On the way to the pyramids I remember walking down a street and just wanted to die.

My mum does pratically everything herself, no tour groups, always better this way. (I like Karnak temple in Luxor, just amazing.)

Read full topic

item.title: I'm leaving
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:16, topic:18190”][quote author=Sepranem link=topic=27197.msg314272#msg314272 date=1160813880]
Ohh, nice. What city if you don’t mind me asking? I live in Cairo, in Maadi if you know it.
[/quote]

We’ll be staying in Luxor, and going to Cairo again. (Going to Abydos and getting the train down, I belive).[/quote]

Dude, you will have the best holiday of your life there. I went there this year and had a fucking amazing time. Luxor is a bit of a shit hole, and the people there are annoying as fuck, but you’ll get used to it. Make sure you visit all the temples in Luxor. They are some pretty amazing structors and it’s really hard to think that these were made so long ago.

All the best mate, hope you have an absolute blinder!

Read full topic

item.title: I'm leaving
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

PaulT:

Pick me up a hash pipe pipe, and avoid temples, they tend to blow up.

I got 2 last visit I’ll get some pics in a few mins. (Can’t find batterys for camera. XD)

Read full topic

item.title: I'm leaving
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:9, topic:18190”]It’s my second holiday to egypt!

The only thing I’m dissapointed in is abu simbel, twice a year the sun shines upon the temple and lights it up inside, but now they only let the first 100 people in to see it, the rest have to watch on a screen outside. The first 100 people there are usually by plane.[/quote]
Must… resist…Urge to kill.

Read full topic

The only thing I’m dissapointed in is abu simbel, twice a year the sun shines upon the temple and lights it up inside, but now they only let the first 100 people in to see it, the rest have to watch on a screen outside. The first 100 people there are usually by plane.

I will be leaving for 2 weeks on the 15th of October, 11 PM GMT. I am going to Egypt for my holiday. If you need to contact me, email me using niallcoates@tiscali.co.uk perferably, niallcoates@msn.com or pm me here.

[size=6pt]Sorry, couldn’t resist. XD[/size][/quote] Oh lol, by the trhead title I thought you meant like the type of leaving Mr.Chris did (leaving forever.) Well have fun in egypt, you lucky bastard.
